item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description: In each of these mysterious images the awe of nature resonates inside its folds and reflections. All origins remain concealed - of the subject and the artefact. The images have the familiarity of a dream dreamt once but feeling dreamt many times. More 'Stalker' than 'Picnic at Hanging Rock'.
item.content:encoded: In each of these mysterious images the awe of nature resonates inside its folds and reflections. All origins remain concealed – of the subject and the artefact. The images have the familiarity of a dream dreamt once but feeling dreamt many times. More ‘Stalker’ than ‘Picnic at Hanging Rock’.
